about_the_game:
NOTE: The game focuses on exploration and builds tension slowly to create a deeper and more meaningful experience. Its story is unveiled through surreal imaging and subtle environment details. The intended release date is Q1 2025.

How far will you go to reunite with your lost daughter?

ItLivesInTheWoods is a first-person psychological horror game set in Canada in modern times.

Plot

You will experience a linear story, full of mystery and twists.

Everything was well before your daughter, Sarah, mysteriously disappeared in the forest during a hiking trip a week ago. You don't know what happened to your daughter or if she is still alive. You only know you want her back safely in your arms again.

The deeper you go into the forest, the more you will question what is real and what is not.

Environment

You will explore a rich procedurally generated forest where the more you explore, the more you will unearth the reality of your daughter. However, in doing so will also introduce you to certain evil, of which you must overcome to reunite with your daughter. Some things you encounter will seem surreal, and may actually be so.

Can you trust your eyes?

Gameplay

You will uncover puzzles and cues of which you must complete to understand your surroundings and progress in the game. Nearly every object in the game is inspectable and/or interactable, where some will enrich the story with new information or backstory, and some will simulate the environment for realism. You only have basic camping gear (i.e. flashlight). The game contains a sophisticated AI developed to be more than just an obstacle in your way. It will hunt you, chase you, and maybe outsmart you in your adventure.

Perhaps you will be face-to-face with an evil which will test your survival skills until either you are defeated or it.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes/images of scenes of violence that can have a negative impact on the psyche. Lastly, there are references to death and scenes that contain blood and animal gore. Some sections of the game may not be suitable for certain age categories. A reasonable restriction of the game audience is recommended.

short_description: ItLivesInTheWoods is a first-person psychological horror set in the forests of Canada. You are Ibrahim, a father who has recently lost his daughter whilst on a hiking trip in the forest last winter. You hope to find out what happened to your daughter and whether you can reunite with her.
